breakfast.title: Naan and Chany
breakfast.description: Naan is a traditional South Asian flatbread that is soft, fluffy, and slightly chewy. It is typically cooked in a tandoor, giving lightly charred flavor

breakfast.title: Paratha
breakfast.description: Paratha is a flaky, layered flatbread made from wheat flour and cooked on a tava (flat pan) with ghee or oil..

breakfast.title: Puri
breakfast.description: Puri is a deep-fried, puffed bread made from unleavened wheat flour dough. It is golden and crisp on the outside, yet soft and airy inside.

lunch.title: Korma
lunch.description: Korma is a luxurious curry dish, known for its creamy, aromatic, and mildly spiced gravy.

lunch.title: Aloo Keema
lunch.description: Aloo Keema is a hearty and flavorful dish made with minced meat (usually beef or mutton) and potatoes cooked in a rich, spiced gravy.

lunch.title: Biryani
lunch.description: Biryani is a legendary South Asian rice dish made with fragrant basmati rice, tender meat (such as chicken, beef, or mutton), and a blend of aromatic spices

dinner.title: Aloo Gosht
dinner.description: Aloo Gosht is a comforting curry that combines tender meat (usually mutton or beef) with soft, flavorful potatoes in a spiced gravy.

dinner.title: Mutton Karahi
dinner.description: Mutton Karahi is a classic Pakistani dish cooked in a traditional wok-like pan called a karahi.

dinner.title: Jalfrezi
dinner.description: Jalfrezi is a vibrant and spicy South Asian curry made with stir-fried meat (such as chicken, mutton, or beef), bell peppers, onions, and tomatoes.

desert.title: Gajar ka Halwa
desert.description: A classic winter delight, Carrot Halwa is made by slowly cooking grated carrots with milk, sugar, and ghee.

desert.title: Rabri
desert.description: Thickened sweetened milk, Rabri is a decadent dessert thatâ€™s enriched with layers of malai (cream), sugar, and subtle flavors of rose water or cardamom.

desert.title: Kheer
desert.description: A traditional rice pudding, Kheer is a creamy dessert made with milk, rice, sugar, and aromatic spices like cardamom.
